XenotypeDef.label: Elves
XenotypeDef.description: Elves are a xenotype designed by master crafter Santa to act as a joyous and kind workforce. Engineered to only feel positivity, happiness, and contentment at all times, they have proven to be the ultimate submissive employee.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: A joyous, helpful, worker xenotype with high crafting skills.
